conclusion: Stream A hits the cyan slanted barrier and turns left.

premise: Stream A flows along the cyan baffle and is guided downward by the next two baffles.
conclusion: Stream A flows straight down hugging the left wall.

premise: Stream A flows downward and reaches container D.
conclusion: Stream A ends in container D.

premise: Stream B flows along the red baffle and is deflected again.

premise: Stream B and C merge and flow along the red baffle, then encounter the compartment.

premise: Stream C flows downward and enters container G.
conclusion: Stream C ends in container G.

premise: No liquid flows into container E.
